title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the Control Example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
EB: The expected behavior is that the tabs in the TabFolder and Frames should not flash excessively when resizing the window in the vertical direction.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Run the Control Example. 
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only. 
3. Observe the excessive flashing of all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames.
